name: Turf War
text:
Choose two —
• Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
• Turf War deals 4 damage to target creature.
• Target creature you control fights target creature you don’t control. 
• Earthshake 3. (Distribute 3 +1/+1 counters among up to 3 target lands you control. You may have them become 0/0 Elemental creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.)
